QuestData.Title: Pulling Weeds
QuestData.Description: With such an abrupt change to the ecology, it is to be expected that some of the flora and fauna don't react as well as we'd hope.$b$bThe uprooted lashers are a troublesome example of this. Roaming the fields to the east and south they are a detriment to the region and must be disposed of.$b$bWhile you're about, please deal with any of these pests that you find.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you helped to deal with the lasher problem, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: On behalf of Desolace herself, I thank you, $r.$b$bPlease accept our deepest gratitude.
